name: Glitchscape
description: This game is a compilation of my creative projects from 2018. Most of the levels are designed around a photograph and then made to be audio-reactive. The game doesn't have many formal structures or defined mechanics it is more of an experience.  The art in the game is made from found photographs from circa 1960-1980 South Africa. This was a tumultuous period in South Africa's history. Some of the photographs and resulting levels are distortions of figures from a secret police counter-insurgency unit called "Koevoet"~ crowbar. The brutality and tragedy of Apartheid are distorted and disseminated in this artistic series.
